title: Kris Jenner steps out in all-black ensemble for a breakfast date with Corey Gamble in Los Angeles
text:
She recently returned home from a whirlwind weekend in South Carolina celebrating Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin's second wedding.

And Kris Jenner was still feeling the love as she stepped out for a breakfast date with her beau Corey Gamble on Thursday in Calabasas, California.

The 63-year-old matriarch looked stylish in an all-black ensembles while enjoying some alone time with her boyfriend.

Let's eat! Kris Jenner was still feeling the love as she stepped out for a breakfast date with her beau Corey Gamble on Thursday in Calabasas, California

Kris rocked a long black blazer which draped down to her knees and featured thick satin lapels.

She kept her monochrome outfit simple with a black T-shirt and matching slacks, hidden underneath a pair of over-the-knee suede boots with a mirrored heel.

Forever the queen of accessories, she carried a massive alligator leather purse across her arm and shielded her eyes from the morning sun with circular frames.

The 63-year-old matriarch looked stylish in an all-black ensembles while enjoying some alone time with her boyfriend

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians mastermind wore her short brown hair in her signature, tousled style.

Corey followed closely behind his lady love wearing a more casual ensemble complete with a white polo shirt and navy slacks.

The couple recently dressed to the nines to witness Justin and Hailey say 'I do' once again, this time in front of family and friends.

Smile: The couple recently dressed to the nines to witness Justin and Hailey say 'I do' once again, this time in front of family and friends

Family: She was joined by youngest daughter Kylie and her granddaughter Stormi, one, at the lavish, black-tie affair

She was joined by youngest daughter Kylie and her granddaughter Stormi, one, at the lavish, black-tie affair.

Ever the ambassador, Kris lent her looks to Kylie's cosmetics page earlier this week where she received some backlash for her appearance.

Fans pointed out that Jenner looked flawless and without any wrinkles in the glam snap despite her age and impressive portfolio of projects while running a multi-million dollar family empire.
description: The 63-year-old matriarch looked stylish in an all-black ensembles while enjoying some alone time with her boyfriend in Calabasas, California.
